mapper.select: select id,name from gk_majored_category where 1=1 and parentId=#{parentId}

select majoredId as code,majoredName as name,enrollNumber as planNumber, schoolLength,foreginLanguage,feeStandard,universityCode,universityName
from gk_enroll_plan where 1=1 and year='2015'
and majoredName like CONCAT('%',#{condition.subjectTypeName},'%')
and majoredName like CONCAT('%',#{condition.majoredTypeName},'%')
and majoredName like CONCAT('%',#{condition.searchName},'%')
and batch=#{condition.batchTypeName}
limit #{start},#{end}

select count(*) from gk_enroll_plan where 1=1 and year='2015'
and majoredName like CONCAT('%',#{condition.subjectTypeName},'%')
and majoredName like CONCAT('%',#{condition.majoredTypeName},'%')
and majoredName like CONCAT('%',#{condition.searchName},'%')
and batch=#{condition.batchTypeName}
select name,educationLevel,subjectType,majoredType,degree,similarMajor,mainCourse,workGuide from gk_majored where 1=1 and id=#{code}
select code,name from gk_enroll_plan where 1=1 and batch=#{batchName} and majoredId=#{code}
